summary: This bill, H.R. 2414, aims to reauthorize the military and civilian partnership for trauma readiness grant program. It amends Section 1291(g) of the Public Health Service Act to specify the grant program's funding for fiscal years 2025 through 2029. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on March 27, 2025, by Ms. Castor of Florida and Mr. Hudson. The bill focuses on providing funding for trauma response and readiness.
